name: Drago's Game Jam Portfolio
description:
A few of the GameMaker nerds and I periodically like to do short game jam 3D GameMaker challenges, and now that I have a few of them I guess I'll start posting them in this project.

Currently there's one missing; I actually don't know where the project for the very first one went. If I find it, I'll add it. Any that I do in the future will also be added here.

Both the game sources and the executables will be attached. In some cases they might not contain exactly what was done within the time frame; if I find a game-breaking bug in testing afterwards I'll try to fix it before posting it here, for obvious reasons.

There have been a few other game jams I've done (a Ludum Dare here, a Global Game Jam there) but at least for the time being I won't be including those.

Live Streams

I (usually) like to live stream these things.

  1. Flight (1 hour)
  2. FPS (1 hour)
  3. Maze game (3 hours)

If you hear anyone else on a call with me in them, it's probably Xor, Snidr, or other people who may have participated.

Credits
  • The logo is a mashup of Jam by Maria Zamchy from the Noun Project and Game by IronSV from the Noun Project
